title: Question 10: The ADSL indicator is off. Why ?
answer:
Check as follows:
(1) Ensure that the telephone line is connected with a splitter properly,
(2) If the telephone line is connected with a junction box, ensure that the junction box does not contain a capacitor or a diode,
(3) Ensure that the telephone line works. Test it with a telephone,
(4) Ensure that the telephone is connected to the splitter properlyï¼›
